## rds-workflow-footer Readme

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


### Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                                                  | Type      | Default |
| -------- | --------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------- |
| `sticky` | `sticky`  | If `true`, workflow footer will be fixed to the bottom of the user's screen. | `boolean` | `false` |


### Slots

| Slot             | Description                                                                                             |
| ---------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| `"action-end"`   | Use this slot for an action item, such as a button, to appear on the right side of the workflow footer. |
| `"action-start"` | Use this slot for an action item, such as a button, to appear on the left side of the workflow footer.  |
| `"narration"`    | Use this slot for narration text within the workflow footer.                                            |


----------------------------------------------

_Built for Resilience Design System @ FM Global_
